metadata.title: CVE-2021-34085 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Read access violation in the III_dequantize_sample function in mpglibDBL/layer3.c in mp3gain through 1.5.2-r2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-9872. CVE-2017-14409, and CVE-2018-10778.

criterions.comment: mp3gain package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
